```{r}
url <- "https://dlr.sd.gov/workforce_services/businesses/warn_notices.aspx"

html <- read_html(url)
```

```{r}
table <- html |> html_elements("table")

table |>
  html_table(header=T)

table |> 
  html_elements("a") |> 
  html_attr("href")

```

```{r}
rows <- html |> 
  html_elements("tr")
```

```{r}
data_rows <- rows[2:69]

data <- NULL

for (row in data_rows) {
  tds <- row |> html_elements("td")
  Company <- tds[1] |> html_text2()
  Link <- tds[1] |> html_element("a") |> html_attr("href")
  Location <- tds[2] |> html_text2()
  Date <- tds[3] |> html_text2()
  #Employees <- tds[4] |> html_text2()
  #table_row <- append(Company, Link, Location, Date, Employees)
  #data <- rbind(data,table_row)
} 
```
